name: AVMutableVideoComposition
desc: An object that represents a mutable video composition.

items.name: init(propertiesOf: AVAsset)
items.desc: Creates a mutable video composition with the specified asset properties.

items.name: init(propertiesOf: AVAsset, prototypeInstruction: AVVideoCompositionInstruction)
items.desc: Creates a mutable video composition with the specified asset properties and a prototype video composition instruction.

items.name: init(asset: AVAsset, applyingCIFiltersWithHandler: (AVAsynchronousCIImageFilteringRequest) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a mutable video composition configured to apply Core Image filters to each video frame of the specified asset.

items.name: var frameDuration: CMTime
items.desc: A time interval for which the video composition should render composed video frames.

items.name: var renderSize: CGSize
items.desc: The size at which the video composition should render.

items.name: var renderScale: Float
items.desc: The scale at which the video composition should render.

items.name: protocol AVVideoCompositionInstructionProtocol
items.desc: A protocol that defines the interface for a video composition instruction.

items.name: var animationTool: AVVideoCompositionCoreAnimationTool?
items.desc: A video composition tool to use with Core Animation in offline rendering.

items.name: var customVideoCompositorClass: AVVideoCompositing.Type?
items.desc: The custom compositor class to use.

items.name: var colorPrimaries: String?
items.desc: The color primaries used for video composition.

items.name: var colorTransferFunction: String?
items.desc: The transfer function used for video composition.

items.name: var colorYCbCrMatrix: String?
items.desc: The YCbCr matrix used for video composition.

items.name: var sourceTrackIDForFrameTiming: CMPersistentTrackID
items.desc: An identifier of the source track from which the video composition derives frame timing.

items.name: var sourceSampleDataTrackIDs: [CMPersistentTrackID]
items.desc: The identifiers of source sample data tracks in the composition that the object requires to compose frames.
